metadata.title: CVE-2020-12279 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgit2 before 0.28.4 and 0.9x before 0.99.0. checkout.c mishandles equivalent filenames that exist because of NTFS short names. This may allow remote code execution when cloning a repository. This issue is similar to CVE-2019-1353.

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
